actions.text: Amendment SA 4671 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4671 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S7496-7497; text: CR S7496) To require the Secretary to submit a report to Congress addressing its compliance with the recommendations from July 6, 2006 Inspector General Report "Progress in Developing the National Asset Database".
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4671 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4671 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Schumer.

purpose: To require the Secretary to submit a report to Congress addressing its compliance with the recommendations from July 6, 2006 Inspector General Report "Progress in Developing the National Asset Database".
